ygData.subject: Re: Valid Source
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there any benefit to playing a character that levels so slowly? IE can a dwarven paladin do things a half elf paladin cannot? From: Michael Wooldirdge To:
ygData.messageBody:
Is there any benefit to playing a character that levels so slowly? IE can a dwarven paladin do things a half elf paladin cannot?
From: Michael Wooldirdge
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:20 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Valid Source


Yes the source was a GM and it is valid. It's also very well known that certain Race/Class combos get exp bonuses or disadvantages. For instance a Dwarven Paladin is one of the slowest leveling characters in the game.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 21st Circle
Dokine Dwarven Cleric of the 5th Circle
